p: Regarding breeds, Castellana negra, Broiler and SPF chicken breeds presented a lower frequency of clinical signs and considerably lower mortality rates (≤ 50%) than Penedesenca, Catalana del Prat, Flor d’Ametller and Euskal Oiloa (≥ 50%) breeds in both H7N1 and H5N8 HPAIVs-inoculations. Only Empordanesa breed presented differing susceptibility depending on the virus tested (93 and 33% mortality after challenge with H7N1 and H5N8, respectively). Catalana del Prat and Penedesenca presented the highest incidence of nervous signs and cutaneous edema among all the tested breeds, respectively (Table 1).
